explanation: [0-0] A man with short black hair, wearing a yellow vest, stands in front of a wooden cabinet. He has his hands clasped in front of his chest, his mouth slightly open, smiling and looking forward. There are white English subtitles at the top of the screen, and the red digital progress bar shows 27%.

[0-4] His mouth turns upward, his expression gradually becoming exaggerated. His eyes widen, revealing a look of horror, and he speaks. His facial proportions begin to change, his eyes turning bloodshot, his smile becoming more and more exaggerated. The scene then cuts to his face becoming even more exaggerated, his forehead higher, his chin longer, his eyes narrowed, his mouth wide open in a comical expression. The scene switches again, his face taking up the entire screen, his mouth wide open revealing his teeth and tongue, his eyes wide open looking at the screen. The red number changes to 56%.
